column2: PC Connection, Inc. engages in the development and provision of information technology solutions. The company is headquartered in Merrimack, New Hampshire and currently employs 2,513 full-time employees. The firm conducts its business operations through three business segments: small- to medium-sized businesses (SMB), Large Account and Public Sector. The firm enables customers to design, enable, manage and service their IT environments. The firm's IT products include computer systems, software and peripheral equipment, networking communications, and other products and accessories that the Company purchases from manufacturers, distributors and other suppliers. The firm also offers services involving design, configuration and implementation of IT solutions. The firm markets its products and services through its Websites, including www.connection.com, www.connection.com/enterprise, www.connection.com/publicsector, and www.macconnection.com. The company uses a combination of outbound telemarketing, including some on-site sales solicitation by business development managers.
